fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Zoom Past. roleblock them.
- When you gain possession of the ball, you astrally roleblock all players you Zoomed Past the next night, and they can't attack you from now on.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You appear innocent.
- Factional chat
- Gains powerful defense if carrying the Ball
- Replaces abilities with factional kill if carrying the Ball
- If you zoom past 3 or more players, you clean whoever you kill from now on.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the team.
